snippet: A RAND Corporation report found that the Israeli and Palestinian economies would stand to gain $173 billion over the next decade if an independent Palestine emerged tomorrow.
abstract: Letter from Jerusalem; report from RAND Corp says Israel and Palestinians would gain $183 billion over decade if peace talks lead to creation of independent Palestine; by contrast, report estimates that contrary outcomes, such as violent Palestinian uprising, would shrink gross domestic product in West Bank and Gaza by 46 percent and by 10 percent in Israel.
lead_paragraph: A RAND Corporation report found that the Israeli and Palestinian economies would stand to gain $173 billion over the next decade if an independent Palestine emerged tomorrow.

headline.print_headline: Profit as an Incentive for Israeli-Palestinian Peace
headline.main: Profit as an Incentive for Israeli-Palestinian Peace
